About SHOOOK

What is SHOOOK?

SHOOOK connects people to caterers for their special life moments around the world. The community is powered by the caterers, who provide their customers with unique opportunity to celebrate life moments via flexible means.

What is vendor?

You can earn money by being a caterer to millions of people in need of experienced or passionate catering service provider.
